pr_title: Do not notify GC if class redef fails

timeline.bodyText: The hash table is not freed along this path. It looks like it could just be moved to after the label.
timeline.author: gacholio

timeline.message:
Do not notify GC if class redef fails

Exit redefineclassescommon gracefully if we fail to recreate a single
ramClass.

Fixes: https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/issues/10104

Signed-off-by: Tobi Ajila <atobia@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: just noticed this, we still have safe/exclusive at this point
timeline.author: tajila
tajila

replies.bodyText: I updated the labels for those
replies.author: tajila
